titles.title: CB 47 Worthy Art Thou, O Lord, Our God

properties.copyright: Â©1979 Thankyou Music (EMI Christian Music Publishing)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
WORTHY ART THOU, O LORD, OUR GOD
Of honor and power,
For You are reigning now on high! Hallelujah!
Jesus is Lord of all the earth! Hallelujah!
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
